articles.title: WHO Recommends Fully Vaccinated People to Wear Masks and Maintain Physical Distance All The Time! - East County Gazette
articles.description: By the soaring number of cases across Europe heading into the holiday season, the World Health Organization is urging the general public to use COVID prevention tactics – such as masking and distance – regardless of their vaccination status. People in some co…
